Writer: Van Robichaux (screenplay by), Evan Susser (screenplay by), Van Robichaux (story by), Evan Susser (story by), Max Greenfield (story by)
Title: Fist Fight
Plot: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.
Actors: Charlie Day, Ice Cube, Tracy Morgan, Jillian Bell
